content.description: Great overhung climbing on fun pockets, leading to a scary slabby top out
content.location: Right side of Elks lodge boulder starts low on good Pockets cross left hand to side pull and up good pockets, then big left hand bump move and cross to jug, then up over lip using hidden under clings and slopy dish up top on the slab!

content.description: Amazing steep climbing on awesome pockets!!
content.location: This is the first boulder to the right of the Elks lounge, It's the steepest boulder in the area, Pinata starts on a good left hand and a great under cling for your right, then follows great pockets out  right to the lip and jugs left and up over the top out!

content.description: Crux at start, Amazing steep climbing
content.location: Starts Bottom left of pi√±ata boulder on good left hand dish and right hand edge under overhang, Follows under cling and jugs up left side of overhang and around bulge to top out!

content.description: Such fun climbing on great steep holds!
content.location: Same start as Pinata, left hand to first big pocket, then right to big jug way out right, cross right again to pocket out left, then cross right out of overhang to good holds out left and top out

content.description: Crux is the throw from the under cling to the jugs out right!! Fun Fun Fun
content.location: Same Start as dulceria but from the first under cling you move gaston to the Bone' feature and move left to a big under cling, then there is a throw with or without an intermediate pinch to the big pocket out right!!
